name: WP Ticket Ultra reCaptcha Add-on
author: WP Ticket Ultra

sections.description:
WP Ticket Ultra Recaptcha offers a great suite of features that will help you to offer Top-Notch Customer Support.

This plugin needs WP Ticket Ultra and it can be used to display a reCaptcha code on multiple pages such as Registration, Login and Password Reset links. Since spam and form abuse are two critical security related issues we’re offering this add-on for free.

Do you need to implement reCAPTCHA in your WordPress?

Check Ultimate Captcha, this plugin allows you to add reCAPTCHA on registration, login, password reset and comments form avoiding spam attacks.

DOCUMENTATION

CLICK HERE to check the documentation.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-ticket-ultra-recaptcha to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload wp-ticket-ultra-recaptcha to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Is there an online documentation?

Yes, http://docs.wpticketultra.com/

Do you offer free support?

Yes, https://wpticketultra.com/contact.php

Do you offer a PRO version?

Yes, https://wpticketultra.com/compare-packages.php
